eol_lighting.h File Reference

#include "eol_types.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Data Structures

struct  eolLight

Enumerations

enum  eolLightTypes { eolLightArea, eolLightSpot, eolLightAmbient, eolLightDirectional }

Functions

void eol_lighting_config ()
 configures the lighting system
void eol_lighting_init ()
 initializes the lighting system
eolBool eol_lighting_initialized ()
 retrieves initialization status for the lighting system
eolLight * eol_light_new ()
 allocates a new light and returns a pointer to it.
void eol_light_free (eolLight **light)
 frees the passed in light and sets pointer to NULL
eolLight * eol_light_area_new ()
 allocates new lights of the type specified
eolLight * eol_light_spot_new ()
eolLight * eol_light_ambient_new ()
eolLight * eol_light_directional_new ()
void eol_light_update (eolLight *light)
 Any changes to the lighting struct will not be applied to the rendering light until this is called.
void eol_lighting_setup_rep_plot ()
 sets up a basic 3 point lighting system useful for most applications use the rep plot when you dont need specific lights, but want to see your 3D scene. Destroy it will a call to eol_lighting_clear();
void eol_lighting_clear ()
 removes all active lights. Used during scene transition. WARNING, it will invalidate all active pointers to lights.
void eol_light_enable (eolLight *light, eolBool enable)
 turns on or off a light without killing the pointer.
void eol_light_point_at (eolLight *light, eolVec3D point)
 points a spot light at a specific point in 3d space does nothing unless light type is spot
void eol_light_move (eolLight *light, eolVec3D point)
 sets lighting position to the point specified. does nothing if spot is ambient or directional
void eol_light_set_color (eolLight *light, eolVec3D color)
 sets the ambient diffuse and specular lighting to color
void eol_light_set_radius (eolLight *light, eolFloat radius)
 sets the light radius for a light. The light is disabled for anything outside the radius of the light.
void eol_lighting_filter_for_position (eolVec3D pos)
 goes through each light and enables / disabled them based on distance to the point passed. Only applies to position based lights.
void eol_light_turn_on (eolLight *light)
 turns light on and enables it for rendering.
void eol_light_turn_off (eolLight *light)
 turns light off and disables it for rendering.
void eol_light_draw ()
 draws a point at the position of the light in the light's color

void eol_light_point_at ( eolLight *  light,
eolVec3D  point 
)

points a spot light at a specific point in 3d space does nothing unless light type is spot

the point to point the light at. Note that if the point is equal to the light's position, it will do nothing.

void eol_light_set_color ( eolLight *  light,
eolVec3D  color 
)

sets the ambient diffuse and specular lighting to color

Parameters:
light the light whose color needs to be changed.
color color as mapped from (x,y,z) to (r,g,b)
